text: Adubu eikhoina aronba amadi ikainingngai oiba thabak pumnamak thadokle. Eikhoina namthak toude aduga Tengban Mapugi waheibusu serannahande. Adubu achumbagi mapungphaba mangalda eikhoina Tengban Mapugi mityengda hingjari amasung mi khudingmakki achum aran khangnabagi pukningda eikhoi isabu khanghannaba hotnajei.
